definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
Zhao Kuo (-260 BC), hapless general of Zhao 趙國|赵国, who famously led an army of 400,000 to total annihilation at battle of Changping 長平之戰|长平之战 in 260 BC/also called Ma Fuzi 馬服子|马服子

sentences.english: Babcock design, supply and construct advanced boiler technology including super critical for the utility power industry.
sentences.chinese: 斗山巴布源設，供貨建設括超臨界技先鍋爐技。

sentences.english: Surely it's the word 'defence' that should be in quotes.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，防禦這個詞應該括上雙引號。

sentences.english: The value between the open and closing curly braces is an eight-element list.
sentences.chinese: 被花括號括起來的是八個元素的列表。

sentences.english: Publication dates are given in brackets after each title.
sentences.chinese: 出版日期括於書名後面。

sentences.english: The braces that surround the statements of a function are one obvious example;
sentences.chinese: 函數體中被花括號括起來的語句便是明顯一例。

sentences.english: The blogs are a cross-section of Iranian society.
sentences.chinese: 這些網誌的內容禳括伊朗社會的方方面面。

sentences.english: Concerning the script commands, wildcarded parameters should always be quoted.
sentences.chinese: 對於腳本命令，通配符參數應始終用引號括起來。

definition: (classical) (of soldiers etc) resolute in the face of adversity
to spread out/to develop/to overflow/to amplify/superfluous
arrow/dart/straight/to vow/to swear/old variant of 屎[shi3]
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]
to expand/to push sth with the hand/to develop/to open up
to make a rubbing (e.g. of an inscription)
